segments.text: I am observing a kitchen scene, quite a busy one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The perspective is slightly angled, showing a sink and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's daytime, and light streams in from an open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh my, the sink is overflowing dramatically!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running from the faucet and pouring over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It forms a continuous sheet, cascading onto the cabinet doors and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A widening puddle is already spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman at the sink seems completely unaware of this happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She is diligently drying a plate, her attention fully on that task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One foot is already submerged in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains utterly neutral, which is astonishing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry she might slip at any moment on that wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to unfold right beneath her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This obliviousness is quite frankly astounding to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
